text: 1:6 1 Tesalonika 5:19; 1 Timoti 4:14Egha kɨ ua nɨghnɨzir kam nɨ ganɨdi, nɨ God nɨ ganɨngizir bizir aghuim damutɨ, a nɨn ikɨ bar gavgavigh, mati gumazim avim givima, an mɨzariam bar ekefe. Nɨ fo, kɨ fomɨra uan dafarim isa nɨn dapanim gatɨzɨ, God gavgavim isa bizir aghuimɨn mɨn nɨ ganɨngi. Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn gavgavir kam bagha nɨ mɨgei.
